content: Homepage of Per Gunningberg Research Projects CACS Research program Courses Bio, pubs & professionals PhD Students Contact info UPPSALA UNIVERSITET: Information Technology Per Gunningberg Professor Emeritus in Computer Communication Email: per.gunningberg [at] it dot uu dot se Phone: +46 70 557 6384 Research I am professor emeritus in Computer Communication at the Computer Architecture and Communications program, CACS, department of Information Technology. I do experimental research within Internet-of-Things(IoT) and mobile and sensor networking. My most recent work include edge support for real-time sensor networks and efficient usage of IoT batteries. I hold a PhD from Uppsala University since 1983, and a MS from University of California Los Angeles, from 1981. I am a co-founder of the company OptiMobile AB. Teaching In Spring 2023 I tought the Distributed Information Systems course. PhD candidate admittance information I do not take on PhD candidates Last updated 18 December 2023.
